steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to add or remove underlines from.
To add an underline, click on the 'Underline' button in the 'Font' group on the 'Home' tab.
To remove an underline, select the text with the underline and click on the 'Underline' button again to toggle it off.
Repeat steps 2-4 for any additional text that you want to add or remove underlines from.
Save the changes to the document.
